title: The Alien and Sedition Acts - intent

content.question: The Alien and Sedition Acts were designed to

choices.label: protect the nation from British spies
prevent the British from fomenting unrest among American Indians
weaken and deflect Republican criticism of the Federalists
counter the Virginia and Kentucky Resolutions

content.answer: weaken and deflect Republican criticism of the Federalists

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
